     a parent contract to be executed as they are `internal` functions.

_mint

devdoc.details: Multi-Fungible Tokens with minting and burning methods. These methods assume     a parent contract to be executed as they are `internal` functions.

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: Amount of objects of a given id ID

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs

params._owners: The addresses of the token holders

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).return: The _owner's balance of the Token types requested

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Function that verifies whether _operator is an authorized operator of _tokenHolder.

params._operator: The address of the operator to query status of

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: A uint256 specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.details: transfer objects from different ids to specified address

params._data: Data to pass to onERC1155Received() function if recipient is contract
params._from: The address to batchTransfer objects from.
params._ids: Array of ids to update balance of - For this implementation, via `uint256(tokenAddress)`
params._to: The address to batchTransfer objects to.
params._values: Array of amount of object per id to be transferred.

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Allow _from or an operator to transfer tokens from one address to another

params._data: Data to pass to onERC1155Received() function if recipient is contract
params._from: The address which you want to send tokens from
params._id: Token id to update balance of - For this implementation, via `uint256(tokenAddress)`.
params._to: The address which you want to transfer to
params._value: The amount of tokens of provided token ID to be transferred

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Will set _operator operator status to true or false

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Query if a contract implements an interface

params._interfaceID: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165
